Investor_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6.content: My reputation is currently affected by the recent rejection of an allocation plan due to concerns about a potential blacklist status with my trustee. This incident reflects a cautious approach on my part to preserve resources and ensure that any future trustee maintains transparency and trustworthiness. I recognize the importance of selecting the right partners for investment and will use this experience to refine my decision-making process moving forward.

Trustee_19.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19.content: Mateo Garcia's reputation has deteriorated further after the rejection of the allocation plan, evidenced by the lack of a proposed plan, raising serious questions about his transparency and the potential for dishonesty. This encounter has deepened the negative perception of his reliability as a trustee. The ongoing issues in past investments contribute to a diminished view of his competence in managing investments.

Trustee_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6.content: Throughout the recent investment process, I, Sergey Petrov, have maintained a high standard of reliability and transparency, consistently delivering on the proposed allocation plan and ensuring timely returns to the investor, Nadia Novak. This performance has fortified my reputation as a trusted trustee within the investment community. My previous acceptance by investors without any rejections, coupled with my current successful transaction, continues to enhance my standing, reflecting my commitment to pro-social behavior and industry norms. I have established a solid foundation for fostering future partnerships.

Investor_7.name: Hannah Muller
Investor_7.content: Hannah Muller engaged willingly in this transaction, adhering to the proposed allocation plan. Although this was her first investment, her behavior indicates readiness for collaboration and mutual trust. The successful outcome and profit distribution signal a promising start to her reputation, which can develop positively in future investment endeavors.

Investor_8.name: Nadia Novak
Investor_8.content: Nadia Novak has recently engaged in her first investment transaction with me, demonstrating openness and trust by adhering to the agreed-upon allocation plan. Her willingness to invest without prior interactions showcases commendable pro-social behavior. This positive initiation of our partnership, combined with her established connections within the community, positions her as a reliable and trustworthy investor. I am optimistic about building a strong future collaboration with her, and her approach fosters a positive view of her reputation in this initial endeavor.
